name: tldp.org LDP linux - Readable width (+beautify)
description:
Mainly a hack to make text more pleasant to read - restrict width.
Screen-example from: http://www.tldp.org/LDP/intro-linux/html/sect_03_01.html

Optionally use style 47519 if you would like the navigation menu to be in fixed position 
at bottom of screen at all times.

Tested on Firefox 4
